summary.purpose: Contains all the individual sub-components that compose the table UI: Filter popup, MaxRowsLabel, DisplayAllRowsButton, ExportToExcel, Search, TableHead, TableBody, TableRow, TableCell, Summary, as well as reusable cell-level display components (TimesUI, TableButton, DurationUI, PhoneUI, BooleanUi, GeoUi, NumberUI).
summary.problem_solved: Breaks down the table into granular, memoised sub-components so each part can be independently rendered and optimised, and provides ready-made UI components for common cell data types like timestamps, durations, booleans, geo coordinates, and phone numbers.

symbols.name: Filter
symbols.description: Memoised filter component that renders a filter icon button on a table header cell. When clicked, it opens a portal-rendered popup with checkbox options for filtering column values. The popup is positioned relative to the button and adapts to LTR/RTL direction and screen resizing.

details.rendered_ui_description: An absolutely-positioned filter icon button in a header cell. When active, a fixed-position popup (rendered via createPortal to document.body) shows the filter label, a close button, a clear-filter button, and a scrollable list of checkboxes for each unique column value.

symbols.name: MaxRowsLabel
symbols.description: Memoised component that displays a label showing how many rows are currently displayed versus total filtered rows (e.g., 'Showing 50 of 200').

details.rendered_ui_description: A horizontal flex container with text showing two configurable labels interleaved with the current display count and total filtered count.

symbols.name: DisplayAllRowsButton
symbols.description: Memoised toggle button that switches between showing a limited number of rows (maxRows) and displaying all filtered rows. Shows the count that will be displayed when clicked.

details.rendered_ui_description: A styled green button with a label (default 'Display:') and a count. Clicking toggles between limited and full row display.

symbols.name: ExportToExcel
symbols.description: Memoised button component that exports the currently rendered table data to an Excel file. Supports adding extra columns, summary rows, custom headlines, and respects LTR/RTL cell alignment. Uses the exportToExcel helper from src/helpers/excel.

details.rendered_ui_description: A styled green button with either custom content or an Excel SVG icon. Clicking triggers an async export-to-Excel operation.

symbols.name: Search
symbols.description: Memoised search input component that renders a text input bound to the table's search state. Supports placeholder, custom styling, and autofocus.

details.rendered_ui_description: A bordered text input field of type 'search' with configurable placeholder and styling, bound to the table context search query.

symbols.name: TableHead
symbols.description: Memoised table header component that renders a sticky thead with column headers. Each header cell supports click-to-sort (when sortKeys are configured), displays a sort direction SVG indicator, and optionally renders a Filter component for filterable columns.

details.rendered_ui_description: A sticky dark-background thead row with header cells. Each cell shows the header text, an optional sort arrow icon, and an optional filter icon/popup.

symbols.name: TableBody
symbols.description: Memoised table body component that iterates over the computed dataToRender.renderedData and renders a TableRow for each item.

details.rendered_ui_description: A tbody element with dividing lines between rows, containing one TableRow per data item.

symbols.name: TableRow
symbols.signature: ({ item, index }: { item: TObject<any>; index: number }) => JSX.Element
symbols.description: Renders a single table row. Supports hover highlighting, zebra striping, custom row class names via function, selected-row highlighting, and an onRowClick callback. Renders a TableCell for each key in keysToRender.

details.rendered_ui_description: A tr element with hover state, optional zebra striping, optional selected-row styling, containing td cells for each configured key.

symbols.name: TableCell
symbols.description: Renders a single table cell (td) with ellipsis truncation, a title tooltip for primitive values, and configurable styling from context.

details.rendered_ui_description: A td element with text truncation (ellipsis), bordered, with a title attribute for tooltip display of the cell value.

symbols.name: Summary
symbols.description: Memoised summary/footer component that computes and displays column sums for configured sumColumns. Each sum is computed from the rendered data and formatted via getFixedNumber, with an optional custom UI renderer.

details.rendered_ui_description: A full-width horizontal bar below the table showing a summary label on one side and computed column totals on the other, styled with bold text.

symbols.name: TimesUIProps
symbols.description: Props interface for the TimesUI component: timestamp value, optional format/fromFormat strings, timezone, direction, className, and defaultReturnedValue.

symbols.name: TimesUI
symbols.signature: ({ timestamp, format, tz, direction, fromFormat, className, defaultReturnedValue }: TimesUIProps) => JSX.Element
symbols.description: Reusable cell component that formats a timestamp value using timestamp_to_string and displays it with LTR direction and text alignment based on the provided direction prop.

details.rendered_ui_description: A div showing a formatted timestamp string with ellipsis truncation and a title tooltip, always rendered in LTR direction with configurable text alignment.

symbols.name: TableButtonProps
symbols.description: Props interface for TableButton: onClick handler, optional title/className/buttonClassName, a type discriminator ('add' | 'edit' | 'delete' | 'custom'), optional children, and disabled flag.

symbols.name: TableButton
symbols.signature: ({ onClick, title, className, type, children, disabled, buttonClassName }: TableButtonProps) => JSX.Element
symbols.description: A polymorphic action button for table rows. Renders different UI based on type: 'add' renders a Button with a plus icon, 'edit'/'delete' render icon buttons with Font Awesome icons, and 'custom' renders children inside a button. All variants include hover scale animation and disabled state handling.

details.rendered_ui_description: A button with scale-on-hover transition. For 'add' type, renders a shadcn-style Button with a plus icon. For 'edit'/'delete', renders a plain button with the corresponding Font Awesome icon. For 'custom', renders children directly.

symbols.name: DurationUIProps
symbols.description: Props interface for DurationUI: numeric duration in seconds, optional labels for days/hours/minutes/seconds, className, and direction.

symbols.name: DurationUI
symbols.signature: ({ duration, daysLabel, hoursLabel, minutesLabel, secondsLabel, className, direction }: DurationUIProps) => JSX.Element
symbols.description: Reusable cell component that converts a duration (in seconds) into a human-readable days/hours/minutes/seconds format. Uses useMemo for efficient computation. Only displays non-zero segments.

details.rendered_ui_description: A horizontal flex container (always LTR) showing segments like '02 d 05 h 30 m 15 s', each with zero-padded values. Non-zero segments are hidden. Title attribute shows the full duration string.

symbols.name: PhoneUI
symbols.signature: ({ phone, direction, className }: { phone: string; direction?: Direction; className?: string }) => JSX.Element
symbols.description: Reusable cell component for displaying phone numbers. Always renders in LTR direction with configurable text alignment for RTL layouts.

details.rendered_ui_description: A div showing a phone number string with ellipsis truncation and a title tooltip, always rendered in LTR direction.

symbols.name: BooleanUIProps
symbols.description: Props interface for BooleanUi: boolean value, optional size ('big' | 'small'), className, and custom trueUi/falseUi ReactNode overrides.

symbols.name: BooleanUi
symbols.signature: ({ value, size, className, falseUi, trueUi }: BooleanUIProps) => JSX.Element
symbols.description: Reusable cell component that displays a boolean value as a check or X icon (Font Awesome), with configurable size and optional custom UI overrides for true/false states.

details.rendered_ui_description: Renders a Font Awesome check icon for true or X icon for false, with configurable size (text-lg or text-2xl). Can be overridden with custom ReactNode for either state.

symbols.name: GeoUiProps
symbols.signature: { value: Partial<Geo> & { latitude?: number; longitude?: number }; className?: string; linkUi?: ReactNode }
symbols.description: Exported props interface for the GeoUi component, accepting a geo coordinate value with latitude/longitude, optional className, and optional custom link UI.

symbols.name: GeoUi
symbols.description: Reusable cell component that renders geographic coordinates as a clickable Google Maps link. Supports both 'lat/lng' and 'latitude/longitude' property naming. Can display custom link UI or defaults to showing coordinates.

details.rendered_ui_description: A blue underlined anchor tag linking to Google Maps, displaying either custom linkUi content or the longitude/latitude values. Opens in a new tab.

symbols.name: NumberUIProps
symbols.signature: { number: string | number; direction?: Direction; className?: string }
symbols.description: Exported props interface for the NumberUI component, accepting a number or string value, optional direction, and optional className.

symbols.name: NumberUI
symbols.description: Reusable cell component for displaying numbers. Always renders in LTR direction with configurable text alignment for RTL layouts, with ellipsis truncation.

details.rendered_ui_description: A div showing a number with ellipsis truncation and a title tooltip, always rendered in LTR direction with configurable text alignment.
